message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.HC, cs.CL, cs.CY 

The paper proposes a recommendation strategy for adaptive learning using deep reinforcement learning, which involves machine learning and artificial intelligence (cs.LG, cs.AI). The strategy also incorporates the element of curiosity, which is related to human-computer interaction and human cognition (cs.HC). The paper also mentions the use of predictive models and neural networks, which are common in natural language processing and computational linguistics (cs.CL). Finally, the paper discusses concrete learning scenarios, which could fall under the category of cybernetics (cs.CY).
